Reference

Core Functionalites

~ Functions for finding points, AOIs, and bounding regions

getAOI()

Get area of interest (AOI) boundary

getBoundingBox()

Get bounding box

getPoint()

Geocode

Tools

~ Tools for exploring, describing and defining AOIs

check()

Map AOI extents

bbox_st()

Bounding box as string

describe()

Describe an AOI

revGeo()

Reverse Geocode

Data and Package Helpers

~ Data and function that make the package useable

counties

USA Counites

states

USA States

aoiProj

AOI Projection

definePoint()

Define a Point

defineClip()

Parse a clip list from user input

checkClass()

Check an objects class

getClip()

Get a bouding box for and AOI

getFiat()

Get State of County Spatial Boundary

nameAOI()

Provide the plain-english description of an AOI

nameClip()

Provide the plain-english description of a clip region

firstLower()

Lower case first character

simpleCap()

Camel Case (Simple Capitalization)

%>%

re-export magrittr pipe operator
